attributes.action: force all MPs to have an income equal to the minimum wage and see how they like it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't get second homes, we don't get expense accounts. Why should good honest working people scrabble around in the dirt trying to make an honest living and pay taxes so that MPs can have these luxuries? 

MPs should come to realise what it's truly like to live on a low income rather than offer some ineffective welfare system to make them look good in the public eye. 

People don't want charity, they want dignity!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
